summary: This is a March 2021 email forwarding a letter from defense attorney Laura Menninger to the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding a discovery request in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). The email shows communication between legal teams in the Ghislaine Maxwell prosecution.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Attorney at Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C. who sent the original letter to the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding a discovery request in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Copied on the email correspondence regarding the discovery request in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Christian R Everdell
persons.context: Attorney at Cohen & Gresser LLP copied on the email regarding the discovery request.

persons.name: Bobbi C Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney copied on the email regarding the discovery request in the Maxwell case.

events.title: Email forwarding discovery request

keyFacts: The document shows ongoing discovery proceedings in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330) in March 2021.
Defense attorney Laura Menninger is corresponding with the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding discovery requests.
Multiple defense attorneys (Jeff Pagliuca, Christian R Everdell, Bobbi C Sternheim) are copied on the correspondence, indicating a coordinated defense team.
The email contains a confidentiality notice, indicating the sensitive nature of the legal communications.
